result.title: Why G++14 runs much slower than G++11?
result.content:
I've submitted exactly the same two codes, one is in G++14, and the other is in G++11. But surprisingly, the code in G++14 gets TLE, but the one in G++11 gets AC. And while the code in G++14 runs over 3500ms on test 46, the one in G++11 runs only 1699ms. Can anyone please explain it?

The code in G++11: http://codeforces.com/contest/703/submission/20380235

The code in G++14: http://codeforces.com/contest/703/submission/20380228
